title: DTK Build Flags Config
description: Version-specific settings for building a DTK project.

ldflags.description: The linker flags to use for this version.

cflags.description: The compile flags to use for this version.

base.description:
Another set of cflags which should be copied into this set, or null to just add include paths.
This inheritance is evaluated in a lowest-to-highest depth order, with includes coming first.
